::Havoc::

Havoc glances at the nearest console, seeing a ship crashing ver=
y 
close to the Alliance base.

"Zardus," he says into his comm, "A ship ha=
s crashed near the base, 
I'll check it out."

He exits the Iron Fist, divi=
ng into the water.
